oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The story of the Great Water Tortoise, who deceived men belonging to the early race of Bushman by feigning illness (told by !kweiten ta //ken), appears to be a variation of the above-mentioned myth (L VI.-2. 4055-4063). Testudo pardalis
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The story of the Leopard Tortoise
